content.description: © 2020 Succession H.Matisse/DACS, London/Photo: © The Phillips Collection, Washington, D.C., USA/Bridgeman Images
content.question: The work shown by Henri Matisse demonstrates an interest in the

choices.label: flattening of pictorial space with unblended brushstrokes of vibrant colors
precise application of paint in careful strokes independent of shapes depicted
fracturing of the subject matter into multiple perspectives visible at once
staining of the unprimed canvas to emphasize process and form over content

content.answer: flattening of pictorial space with unblended brushstrokes of vibrant colors

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
